title: Culturally Inclusive Design for Online Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and elementary-level language comprehension
context.additional_context: Language education curriculum design for multicultural background learners in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can identify and apply language expressions reflecting diverse cultural backgrounds with over 80% accuracy on an online platform.
Learners execute effective communication strategies more than three times in collaborative tasks with peer learners without cultural bias.
Learners can explain five elements of culturally responsive lesson design (e.g., multicultural content, inclusive language) through formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
